title: God Delivers Jerusalem
summary: Hezekiah seeks God’s help through prayer and the prophet Isaiah. God promises deliverance. That night, the angel of the Lord strikes down 185,000 Assyrian soldiers. King Sennacherib returns to Nineveh, where he is later assassinated.

faq.question: How did God respond to Hezekiah’s prayer?
faq.answer: He promised protection and destroyed the Assyrian army in one night.

faq.question: What happened to King Sennacherib?
faq.answer: He returned to Assyria and was assassinated by his sons.
